COMMENT_TX: Joe Torre struck by foul ball
Game called on account of rain
70 minute rain delay before start of game
Game called after 30 minute rain delay
$Lou Johnson out on appeal for leaving 3B too soon
$Mets manager Gil Hodges suffered mild heart attack in dugout during second inning; coach Rube Walker managed team for remainder of year
$Sonny Jackson threw the ball away, allowing Cleon Jones to take 2B; Walt Hriniak is slow retrieving the ball, allowing Jones to take 3B
